panels.description: Recent root traces from the monitoring-api service (API-initiated requests only). Click a Trace ID to open the full waterfall view in Jaeger.
panels.title: Recent Traces — monitoring-api

panels.description: End-to-end distributed traces showing the complete message flow from producer to consumer. Each trace contains spans from both stream-processor (publish) and monitoring-api (consume). Click any Trace ID to see the full waterfall in Jaeger.
panels.title: Linked Pub-Sub Traces (Producer → Kafka → Consumer)

panels.description: Transaction volume broken down by status (approved, denied, failed, reversed, etc.) as a stacked area chart.
panels.title: Transaction Volume by Status

panels.description: Per-minute rate of denied, failed, and reversed transactions — the statuses we alert on.
panels.title: Denied / Failed / Reversed Rate

panels.description: Overall anomaly score from the Isolation Forest model. Lower = more anomalous. Green (normal) → Yellow (warning) → Red (critical).
panels.title: Overall Anomaly Score

panels.description: Per-status Z-scores from the anomaly detector. Higher absolute values indicate more deviation from normal.
panels.title: Anomaly Z-Score by Status

panels.description: Count of alerts fired in the last 5 minutes by status and severity.
panels.title: Alert History (last 5m)

panels.description: Approval rate = approved / total. A dropping approval rate is a key business health indicator.
panels.title: Approval Rate
